title: `eth_syncing` returned false at very beginning of sync
body:
**Description**
An `eth_syncing` call was executed at exactly: 2023-11-27 18:06:07.1927

At this moment this node was at the very beginning of the sync:
```
27 Nov 18:06:03 | EngineUrl specified. EnginePort 8551 EngineHost 0.0.0.0. Additional JSON RPC URL 'http://localhost:8551' has engine module enabled. skipping...
27 Nov 18:06:03 | Reading authentication secret from '/tmp/jwt/jwtsecret'
27 Nov 18:06:04 |
======================== Nethermind initialization completed ========================
This node    : enode://92a41d897f4df2d38411001bd4daa1f232decd08c3158b122cea5b197f30eae9d161d0de314fbb3d37e4a00216cfea55a736aa7aa5a0fd17f15a53ac49e11817@139.144.22.88:30303
RPC modules  : Admin, Debug, Eth, Net, Parity, Personal, Proof, Rpc, Subscribe, Trace, TxPool, Web3
Node address : 0x0e40b59b99ebae0576707598d0c97138bd1b2816 (do not use as an account)
Mem est tx   :    82 MB
Mem est DB   :    33 MB
JSON RPC     : http://0.0.0.0:8545 ; http://0.0.0.0:8551
Genesis hash : 0xb5f7f912443c940f21fd611f12828d75b534364ed9e95ca4e307729a4661bde4
External IP  : 139.144.22.88
Ethereum     : tcp://139.144.22.88:30303
Discovery    : udp://139.144.22.88:30303
Client id    : Nethermind/v1.23.0-rc+62aa21b5/linux-x64/dotnet7.0.14
Chainspec    : chainspec/holesky.json
Chain head   : 0
Chain ID     : 17000
=====================================================================================
27 Nov 18:06:07 | Full Pruning: Chain size estimation is unavailable.
27 Nov 18:06:09 | Waiting for Forkchoice message from Consensus Layer to set fresh pivot block [10s]
27 Nov 18:06:19 | Waiting for Forkchoice message from Consensus Layer to set fresh pivot block [20s]
```

`eth_syncing` returned false when it should return information about sync in progress.

Reproduced on Holesky chain.
